data.name: Ice Station Z - Tiger Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Tiger Skin Pack.

Top Tiger mask.
Pure Chrome goggles.
Tiger Camo jacket.
Cloudburst backpack (animated).
Tiger Camo trousers.
